(family) †
Plethodus Dixon 1850
[changed to † Plethodontidae by Hay 1929: 736 , but Plethodontidae preoccupied in Amphibia ; the incorrect subsequent spelling † Plethodontidae is invalid, ICZN Opinion 921]

(family) †

[family name sometimes seen as †Thryptodidae]

in fishes; invalid, Art. 39]

Tselfatia Arambourg 1944
[family name also seen as † Tselfatiidae ; correct stem is Tselfati-]
